Html:
Hi,
I'm using MEF with Prism 4 in developing LOB application and i wonder if it is possible to integerate LinqPad 4 to my application to be launched from menu item or icon within my application and use it as any dialog box . Do MEF has this capability?
Thanks

Hi,

I'm not familiar with LinqPad 4, but since it is an application with no source code available, you probably won't be able to include it as a plug-in for your application. Nevertheless, it would be advisable for you to contact the LinqPad team for more information about this.

Regards,

Federico Martinez
http://blogs.southworks.net/fmartinez
